name: YOAP
goal:
Mission

Our mission is the social and psychological well-being of educators and youth counselors through participation in the lifelong learning process.

Work

Our work aims to facilitate the personal, social and educational development of citizens for continuous learning and professional accountability.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives: We use non-formal learning methods such as self-confidence techniques to strengthen the working capacity of youth workers and promote access to specialised dialogue as a tool for addressing youth issues.
